No surprise fees or roaming charges

Visiting Poland soon? Save money with a Poland eSIM (downloadable SIM card) with local data starting at just $4.50 a week.

Get cheap data: Install a Poland eSIM on your phone and activate your data package to enjoy a steady internet connection anywhere in Poland, without needing Wi-Fi.

Never pay roaming charges: Avoid carrier roaming charges by toggling off Data Roaming for your primary SIM, or toggling off your primary SIM entirely. Need help? We‚Äôre available 24/7.

Check phone compatibility

Supported networks: Plus

Expected speeds: 5G

Limitations: Fully unthrottled data

Data top-up available: Yes

Hotspot / Tethering: Yes

ID/documentation required: No

Phone number: Included with purchase

How does a Poland eSIM work?

An eSIM is an embedded SIM card, and you probably already have an eSIM-compatible device. When you install an eSIM for a country or region, it lets your device connect to local networks in that area. This means your device will have data without needing Wi-Fi or paying roaming charges.

Get the aloSIM app

Enjoy your Poland vacation

Explore top attractions in Poland

Poland‚Äôs beautiful landscapes, vibrant culture, and historical sites make it a well-known travel destination in Central Europe.

The Auschwitz-Birkenau Memorial and Museum: One of the top tourist destinations in Poland because it preserves and reminds visitors of the important national history lived by many in this country.

Vistula River Beach: This is the most scenic location in Poland! The Vistula serves as a hub for entertainment and outdoor activities.

Wawel Royal Castle: A diverse architectural arts center that holds incredible artwork and historical pieces.

Popular foods to try in Poland

When visiting Poland, there are several dishes you won‚Äôt want to miss! Enjoy traditional Polish foods, which will complement your trip to this amazing country.

Kie≈Çbasa: This is a popular smoked sausage made from a variety of meats, with a wide range of flavors and shapes. Often served on a bun at local festivals, this is a must-try!

Bigos: A sour cabbage dish mixed with mushrooms, chopped onions, dried plums, and different kinds of meats.

≈ªurek: A hard-boiled egg and pieces of boiled pork are typically included in this soup, which is usually served in edible bowls.

What‚Äôs the best time to visit Poland?

Poland experiences different seasons throughout the year. Each season brings changes in weather and fun activities.

March and April: It‚Äôs the perfect time of year to travel to Poland and explore the main cities and sites because the weather is mild and comfortable.

May to September: The climate is warm during these months, which makes it ideal for water sports and exploring local parks and wildlife.

December and January: These months are popular for those who enjoy winter weather. Outdoor winter sports are popular this time of year!

What to pack for a vacation to Poland

To fully enjoy Poland‚Äôs popular sites and location, don‚Äôt forget to pack these essential items ‚Ä¶

Comfortable Shoes: Select comfortable shoes that can be worn all day and are good for walking on any surface.

Rolling Luggage: Your trips through airports, cabs, city centers, and trains will be a lot easier if you‚Äôre using luggage with wheels!

Packing Cubes: They‚Äôll keep you organized and prevent you from overpacking, making your trip easier and more enjoyable.

FAQs about using eSIM in Poland

Check your device

Most newer phones, tablets, and computers are already eSIM-compatible, so use our eSIM device checker to make sure you have a device that can accept an eSIM data plan.

Free Wi-Fi is great when it‚Äôs available and working well, but some destinations make it just about impossible to get a good connection. That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs nice to have data as a backup to stay connected.

We‚Äôre proud to provide aloSIM customers with fast eSIM data connections that allow them to talk, text, surf, and stream comfortably. You‚Äôll likely experience a 4G (sometimes 5G) or LTE equivalent network in most locations, depending on what‚Äôs available in the area.

Installation guides

We have detailed eSIM installation instructions for all compatible devices, so whether you‚Äôre looking to add eSIM data to an iPhone or iPad, Google Pixel, Samsung Galaxy, or something else, we‚Äôll be able to walk you through the eSIM set-up process easily.
